original_text: Then the female servants and their children came to Esau. As they came near to him, they bent down to the ground.
korean_text: 그 때에 여종들이 그의 자식들과 더불어 나아와 절하고

sentences.original_text: Then the female servants came to Esau
and their children came to Esau
As they came near to him
they bent down to the ground
